verses.verse: וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָכֹ֨ל <S%H3201><s%> could יוֹסֵ֜ף <S%H3130><s%> Then Joseph לְהִתְאַפֵּ֗ק <S%H662><s%> not refrain לְכֹ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> all הַנִּצָּבִים֙ <S%H5324><s%> himself before all them that stood עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and he וַיִּקְרָ֕א <S%H7121><s%> by him and he cried הוֹצִ֥יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> to go out כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> have everyone אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man מֵעָלָ֑י <S%H5921><s%> out וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no עָ֤מַד <S%H5975><s%> from me And there stood אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> no man אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> for בְּהִתְוַדַּ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> made himself known יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> with him while Joseph אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֶחָֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> unto his brethren

וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> aloud אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֹל֖וֹ <S%H6963><s%> loudly בִּבְכִ֑י <S%H1065><s%> overflowing וַיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian וַיִּשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> heard בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יוֹסֵ֤ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> unto his brethren אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> I [am] Joseph הַע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> doth my father חָ֑י <S%H2416><s%> age וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָכְל֤וּ <S%H3201><s%> could אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> to his brothers לַעֲנ֣וֹת <S%H6030><s%> not answer אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נִבְהֲל֖וּ <S%H926><s%> him for they were troubled מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> at his presence

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יוֹסֵ֧ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֶחָ֛יו <S%H251><s%> unto his brethren גְּשׁוּ־ <S%H5066><s%> Come near נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about וַיִּגָּ֑שׁוּ <S%H5066><s%> to me I pray you And they came near וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I יוֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3130><s%> I [am] Joseph אֲחִיכֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> your brother אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom מְכַרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H4376><s%> whom ye sold אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H6258><s%> Now אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּעָ֣צְב֗וּ <S%H6087><s%> Now therefore be not grieved וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not יִ֙חַר֙ <S%H2734><s%> nor angry בְּעֵ֣ינֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> with yourselves כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because מְכַרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H4376><s%> that ye sold אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because לְמִֽחְיָ֔ה <S%H4241><s%> to preserve life שְׁלָחַ֥נִי <S%H7971><s%> did send אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> me hither for God לִפְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> me before you

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for זֶ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> these שְׁנָתַ֥יִם <S%H8141><s%> For these two years הָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> [hath] the famine בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> [been] in הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְעוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> are still חָמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and yet [there are] five שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> in the which [there shall] neither חָרִ֖ישׁ <S%H2758><s%> [be] earing וְקָצִּֽיר׃ <S%H7105><s%> nor harvest

וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֤נִי <S%H7971><s%> sent אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> And God לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> me before you לָשׂ֥וּם <S%H7760><s%> to preserve לָכֶ֛ם שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <S%H7611><s%> you a posterity בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth וּלְהַחֲי֣וֹת <S%H2421><s%> and to save your lives לָכֶ֔ם לִפְלֵיטָ֖ה <S%H6413><s%> deliverance גְּדֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> by a great

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אַתֶּ֞ם <S%H859><s%> who שְׁלַחְתֶּ֤ם <S%H7971><s%> So now [it was] not you [that] sent אֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> but הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> me hither but God וַיְשִׂימֵ֨נִֽי <S%H7760><s%> and he hath made לְאָ֜ב <S%H1><s%> me a father לְפַרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> to Pharaoh וּלְאָדוֹן֙ <S%H113><s%> and lord לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> of all his house וּמֹשֵׁ֖ל <S%H4910><s%> and a ruler בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> throughout all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

מַהֲרוּ֮ <S%H4116><s%> Haste וַעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> ye and go up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָבִי֒ <S%H1><s%> to my father וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֣ם <S%H559><s%> and say אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> unto him Thus saith בִּנְךָ֣ <S%H1121><s%> thy son יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph שָׂמַ֧נִי <S%H7760><s%> hath made אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> God לְאָד֖וֹן <S%H113><s%> me lord לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of all Egypt רְדָ֥ה <S%H3381><s%> come down אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעֲמֹֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> unto me tarry

וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֣ <S%H3427><s%> And thou shalt dwell בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> in the land גֹּ֗שֶׁן <S%H1657><s%> of Goshen וְהָיִ֤יתָ <S%H1961><s%> become קָרוֹב֙ <S%H7138><s%> and thou shalt be near אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about אַתָּ֕ה <S%H859><s%> you וּבָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H1121><s%> unto me thou and thy children וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and thy children's בָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H1121><s%> children וְצֹאנְךָ֥ <S%H6629><s%> and thy flocks וּבְקָרְךָ֖ <S%H1241><s%> and thy herds וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לָֽךְ׃

וְכִלְכַּלְתִּ֤י <S%H3557><s%> And there will I nourish אֹֽתְךָ֙ <S%H853><s%> שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> There כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> there ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> are still חָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> thee for yet [there are] five שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years רָעָ֑ב <S%H7458><s%> of famine פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> come תִּוָּרֵ֛שׁ <S%H3423><s%> and all that thou hast come to poverty אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you וּבֵֽיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> lest thou and thy household וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לָֽךְ׃

וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5869><s%> And behold your eyes רֹא֔וֹת <S%H7200><s%> see וְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> and the eyes אָחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> of my brother בִנְיָמִ֑ין <S%H1144><s%> Benjamin כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that it פִ֖י <S%H6310><s%> that [it is] my mouth הַֽמְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> that speaketh אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וְהִגַּדְתֶּ֣ם <S%H5046><s%> And ye shall tell לְאָבִ֗י <S%H1><s%> my father אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all כְּבוֹדִי֙ <S%H3519><s%> of all my glory בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you רְאִיתֶ֑ם <S%H7200><s%> and of all that ye have seen וּמִֽהַרְתֶּ֛ם <S%H4116><s%> and ye shall haste וְהוֹרַדְתֶּ֥ם <S%H3381><s%> and bring down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> my father הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2008><s%> here

וַיִּפֹּ֛ל <S%H5307><s%> And he fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and צַוְּארֵ֥י <S%H6677><s%> neck בִנְיָמִֽן־ <S%H1144><s%> Benjamin's אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> upon his brother וַיֵּ֑בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> and wept וּבִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin בָּכָ֖ה <S%H1058><s%> wept עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on צַוָּארָֽיו׃ <S%H6677><s%> upon his neck

וַיְנַשֵּׁ֥ק <S%H5401><s%> Moreover he kissed לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> all his brethren וַיֵּ֣בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> and wept עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> upon וְאַ֣חֲרֵי <S%H310><s%> upon them and after כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> after that דִּבְּר֥וּ <S%H1696><s%> talked אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> that his brethren אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> now when

וְהַקֹּ֣ל <S%H6963><s%> And the fame נִשְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> thereof was heard בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> house פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> in Pharaoh's לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying בָּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> are come אֲחֵ֣י <S%H251><s%> brethren יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph's וַיִּיטַב֙ <S%H3190><s%> be accepted בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> and פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh וּבְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> affliction עֲבָדָֽיו׃ <S%H5650><s%> his servants

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> unto Joseph אֱמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> Say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַחֶ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> unto thy brethren זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> This do טַֽעֲנוּ֙ <S%H2943><s%> ye lade אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּעִ֣ירְכֶ֔ם <S%H1165><s%> your beasts וּלְכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> along בֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> get אַ֥רְצָה <S%H776><s%> you unto the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

וּקְח֧וּ <S%H3947><s%> And take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִיכֶ֛ם <S%H1><s%> your father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּתֵּיכֶ֖ם <S%H1004><s%> and your households וּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> and come אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me וְאֶתְּנָ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> unto me and I will give לָכֶ֗ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> טוּב֙ <S%H2898><s%> you the good אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְאִכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> and ye shall eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֵ֥לֶב <S%H2459><s%> the fat הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

וְאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> now you צֻוֵּ֖יתָה <S%H6680><s%> Now thou art commanded זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> this do קְחוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> ye take לָכֶם֩ מֵאֶ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt עֲגָל֗וֹת <S%H5699><s%> you wagons לְטַפְּכֶם֙ <S%H2945><s%> for your little ones וְלִנְשֵׁיכֶ֔ם <S%H802><s%> and for your wives וּנְשָׂאתֶ֥ם <S%H5375><s%> and bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> your father וּבָאתֶֽם׃ <S%H935><s%> and come

וְעֵ֣ינְכֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> Also אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תָּחֹ֖ס <S%H2347><s%> regard עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with כְּלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H3627><s%> not your stuff כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֛וּב <S%H2898><s%> for the good כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of all the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לָכֶ֥ם הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> did כֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> so בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לָהֶ֥ם יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> so and Joseph עֲגָל֖וֹת <S%H5699><s%> them wagons עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> according to the commandment פַרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and gave לָהֶ֛ם צֵדָ֖ה <S%H6720><s%> them provision לַדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> for the way

לְכֻלָּ֥ם <S%H3605><s%> he נָתַ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> To all of them he gave לָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H582><s%> another חֲלִפ֣וֹת <S%H2487><s%> changes שְׂמָלֹ֑ת <S%H8071><s%> of raiment וּלְבִנְיָמִ֤ן <S%H1144><s%> but to Benjamin נָתַן֙ <S%H5414><s%> he gave שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [pieces] of silver וְחָמֵ֖שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five חֲלִפֹ֥ת <S%H2487><s%> changes שְׂמָלֹֽת׃ <S%H8071><s%> of raiment

וּלְאָבִ֞יו <S%H1><s%> And to his father שָׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> he sent כְּזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> after this עֲשָׂרָ֣ה <S%H6235><s%> [manner] ten חֲמֹרִ֔ים <S%H2543><s%> she asses נֹשְׂאִ֖ים <S%H5375><s%> laden מִטּ֣וּב <S%H2898><s%> with the good things מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְעֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> and ten אֲתֹנֹ֡ת <S%H860><s%> asses נֹֽ֠שְׂאֹת <S%H5375><s%> laden בָּ֣ר <S%H1250><s%> with corn וָלֶ֧חֶם <S%H3899><s%> and bread וּמָז֛וֹן <S%H4202><s%> and meat לְאָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> for his father לַדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> by the way

וַיְשַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> his brethren וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> departed וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּרְגְּז֖וּ <S%H7264><s%> unto them See that ye fall not out בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> by the way

וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> And they went up מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and came אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> about יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob אֲבִיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> their father

וַיַּגִּ֨דוּ <S%H5046><s%> And told ל֜וֹ לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> him saying ע֚וֹד <S%H5750><s%> is still יוֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph חַ֔י <S%H2416><s%> [is] yet alive וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> and indeed ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מֹשֵׁ֖ל <S%H4910><s%> and he [is] governor בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> over all the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַיָּ֣פָג <S%H6313><s%> fainted לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> And Jacob's heart כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> and indeed לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הֶאֱמִ֖ין <S%H539><s%> for he believed לָהֶֽם׃

וַיְדַבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> And they told אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֤י <S%H1697><s%> him all the words יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> which he had said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to וַיַּרְא֙ <S%H7200><s%> unto them and when he saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣עֲגָל֔וֹת <S%H5699><s%> the wagons אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> had sent יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> which Joseph לָשֵׂ֣את <S%H5375><s%> to carry אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַתְּחִ֕י <S%H2421><s%> revived ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> him the spirit יַעֲקֹ֥ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob אֲבִיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> their father

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> And Israel רַ֛ב <S%H7227><s%> [It is] enough עוֹד־ <S%H5750><s%> is still יוֹסֵ֥ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph בְּנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> my son חָ֑י <S%H2416><s%> [is] yet alive אֵֽלְכָ֥ה <S%H1980><s%> will go וְאֶרְאֶ֖נּוּ <S%H7200><s%> and see him בְּטֶ֥רֶם <S%H2962><s%> before אָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> before I die
